original_text: While they were on the way, news came to David, “Absalom has struck down all the king's sons, and not one of them is left.”
korean_text: 그들이 길에 있을 때에 압살롬이 왕의 모든 아들들을 죽이고 하나도 남기지 아니하였다는 소문이 다윗에게 이르매

sentences.original_text: While they were on the way,
Absalom has struck down all the king's sons,
and not one of them is left.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 명도 남지 않았다.”
